subject: Order SSN4647
description_text:
Hi why i recieve when i want to track my parcel always an error that this tracking number has no information? The parcel was sent on Thursday last week?


Regards
Zeches Laurent
Von meinem iPhone gesendet

conversations.body_text: Hi Laurent Zeches,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse is out of stock for the footrest, with restocking expected today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fee you paid.

Hi, so the order will be there before christmas?
Regards
Zeches Laurent
Von meinem iPhone gesendet
